name: For Aster: printing memory
description:
a gift to someone who was a prolific printmaker in the queer community of NorCal. not too much to say, other than the feeling of regret for the people you never got the chance to really know. i'll keep drawing medusas all day long and bite anyone in the medical field who treats queer people like shit and i'll think of you every time.

wasd to move around, click start is the only mouse moment; press full screen button in corner (made for 1920*1080 screen so you might get black bars)

link to view their art here
